recipeInstructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take a shaker, fill it with ice, tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur. Shake well and strain into the glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Muddle mint leaves and 1 lime wedge in a sturdy glass. Add 2 more lime wedges and sugar, then muddle again. Fill the glass with ice. Pour the rum over and fill the glass with club soda. Stir and garnish with the remaining lime wedge.

Place the sugar cube in an Old Fashioned glass. Wet it down with bitters and a short splash of water. Crush the sugar with a wooden muddler. Rotate the glass so that the sugar grains and bitters give it a lining. Add a large ice cube and pour in the whiskey. Garnish with an orange twist.

recipeIngredients: 1 or 3 Olives or a Lemon twist for garnish
recipeInstructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes. Add gin or vodka and vermouth. Stir for 30 seconds and then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with olives or a lemon twist.

Add rum, cream of coconut, pineapple juice, and lime juice into a shaker with ice, and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled Hurricane glass over pebble ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass filled with large ice cubes. Garnish with an orange peel.
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Add rum, lime juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

Add white rum, lime juice, orange curaçao, and orgeat into a shaker with ice and shake well. Pour into a glass filled with crushed ice. Float the dark rum on top. Garnish with a mint sprig and lime wheel.

recipeIngredients: Celery stalk and lime wedge for garnish
recipeInstructions: In a shaker, combine the vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, celery salt, pepper, and hot sauce. Fill with ice and shake gently. Strain into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with a celery stalk and a lime wedge.
Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a glass filled with ice and top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.
Shake cognac, lemon juice, and triple sec with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne and garnish with a lemon twist.

recipeIngredients: Cherry and lemon wedge for garnish
recipeInstructions: Shake whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon wedge.
Muddle the lime and sugar in a glass. Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça. Stir well.
Fill a Moscow Mule mug with ice. Pour in vodka and lime juice. Add ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with a lime slice and a sprig of mint.
Fill a wine glass with ice. Add Prosecco, Aperol, and soda water. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.
Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Add vodka, tequila, rum, triple sec, gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with a splash of cola. Garnish with a lemon wedge.
Fill a shaker with ice, vodka, coffee liqueur, fresh espresso, and simple syrup. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

Muddle mint leaves and simple syrup in a julep cup. Add bourbon and fill the cup with crushed ice. Stir until the cup is frosted on the outside. Top with more crushed ice and garnish with a mint sprig.

In a large pitcher, combine red wine, brandy, orange juice, and sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Add orange, lemon, lime, and apple slices. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Before serving, add soda water.
Fill a highball glass with ice. Add dark rum and lime juice. Top with ginger beer. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.
Salt the rim of a highball glass. Fill the glass with ice, add tequila and lime juice. Top with grapefruit soda. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.
Shake amaretto, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Chill an old-fashioned glass by filling it with ice. In a separate glass, muddle the sugar cube and bitters. Add rye whiskey and ice, and stir well. Discard the ice from the chilled glass and coat the glass with absinthe. Strain the whiskey mixture into the glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.
Shake blended Scotch whisky, lemon juice, and honey-ginger syrup with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Float the Islay Scotch on top. Garnish with candied ginger.
Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Drizzle blackberry liqueur over the top. Garnish with fresh blackberries and a lemon slice.
Shake gin, maraschino liqueur, crème de violette, and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Pour vodka and orange juice into a glass with ice. Stir well. Float Galliano on top. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.
Pour Scotch whisky and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon peel.
Pour vodka and coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with heavy cream and stir gently.
Pour vodka and coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

Pour tequila and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Slowly pour grenadine around the inside edge of the glass. It will sink and slowly rise to mix with the other ingredients. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.
Pour vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and orange juice into a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange slice.
Pour vodka and blue curaçao into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with lemonade. Stir gently. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon slice.
Drizzle chocolate syrup around the inside of a glass. Add vodka, coffee liqueur, and Irish cream liqueur to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass. Top with whipped cream.
Pour vodka, triple sec, and lime juice into a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass or an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
Pour light rum, dark rum, apricot brandy, lime juice, pineapple juice, and grenadine into a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with mint.

Combine gin, cherry liqueur, Cointreau, Benedictine, pineapple juice, lime juice, grenadine, and bitters in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top with club soda. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of pineapple.
Pour Crème de Cassis into a champagne flute. Gently pour champagne over it. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Pour Scotch whisky and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
Pour vodka, cranberry juice, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Combine Pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white in a shaker. Shake vigorously without ice. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a few drops of Angostura bitters.
Shake rum, grapefruit juice, maraschino liqueur, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipeIngredients: Raspberry or lemon twist for garnish
recipeInstructions: Shake vodka, Chambord, and pineapple juice with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a raspberry or a lemon twist.
Shake green crème de menthe, white crème de cacao, and cream with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

In a shaker, combine gin, tomato juice, lemon juice, Tabasco, Worcestershire sauce, celery salt, pepper, and smoked paprika. Fill with ice and shake gently. Strain into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a celery stalk.
Stir bourbon or rye whiskey, Campari, and sweet vermouth over ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or serve over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Combine gin, raspberry syrup, lemon juice, and egg white in a shaker. Shake without ice, then add ice and shake again. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Shake gin, Green Chartreuse, maraschino liqueur, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Shake bourbon, Aperol, Amaro Nonino, and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Shake gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Shake gin, lemon juice, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, and absinthe with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Shake tequila, crème de cassis, and lime juice with ice. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge.
Shake bourbon, lemon juice, and honey syrup with ice. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass.
Shake blended Scotch whisky, lemon juice, and honey-ginger syrup with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Float the Islay Scotch on top. Garnish with candied ginger.
Shake Southern Comfort, amaretto, sloe gin, and orange juice with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Shake cognac, dark crème de cacao, and cream with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg.
Rim a cocktail glass with cinnamon sugar. Shake spiced rum, orange curaçao, and lemon juice with ice. Strain into the prepared glass.
Pour elderflower liqueur and lemon juice into a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Pour Irish whiskey and brown sugar syrup into a mug. Fill with hot coffee. Gently float cream on top.
Pour Campari and sweet vermouth into an ice-filled glass. Top with Prosecco. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.
Muddle mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup. Add aged rum and bitters. Shake with ice. Strain into a glass and top with Champagne.
Shake dark rum, lime juice, grenadine, simple syrup, and bitters with ice. Strain into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.
Shake gin, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, orange flower water, cream, and egg white without ice. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a glass and top with soda water.
